metrics.name: Average processing time for purchase orders
metrics.description: Average time from the creation of a purchase order to its acknowledgment
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_acknowledgement_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Average confirmation time for purchase requisitions
metrics.description: Average time needed to confirm a purchase requisition by creating a purchase order
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_creation_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_pr_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Average invoice payment time
metrics.description: Average time to clear invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Goods return rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with delivery returns
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name)
			WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_return_delivery_events})) > 0
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Average time from purchase order to delivery
metrics.description: Average time from purchase order to goods receipt
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_creation_events}))
   )

metrics.name: Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late payments. Only cases that are paid are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_late_payment_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Overdue payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue payments. Only cases that have not been paid yet are considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_overdue_payment_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_date} IS NULL)
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Process compliance
metrics.description: Percentage of compliant Procure-to-Pay cases
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_compliant_event_sequence})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Two-way match rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders with a two-way match
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_two_way_match_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Cancellation rate of purchase orders
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with cancelled purchase order items
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
			WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_item_cancellation_events}))) IS NOT NULL
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Late deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Late deliveries net value
metrics.description: Net order value of cases with late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Average delay of late deliveries
metrics.description: The average delay time of late deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: On-Time Delivery rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with on-time deliveries. Only cases that have been completely delivered are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries cases
metrics.description: Number of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Overdue deliveries net value
metrics.description: Net order value of cases with overdue deliveries. Only cases that have not been (completely) delivered yet are considered.

metrics.name: Payment block rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in which a payment block was set
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
			WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_payment_block_events}))) IS NOT NULL
	)
/ COUNT(case_id)
* 100

metrics.name: Maverick Buying - Prices Changes after Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with price changes that happened after the Goods Receipt had already been registered

metrics.name: Maverick Buying Rate - PO Creation after Invoice Creation
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in which the PO Item was created after the Invoice, a common indicator for Maverick Buying
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_maverick_buying_po_after_invoice_condition})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: POs created after Invoice Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases in which a PO Item has been created after the Invoice Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER
	(WHERE (event_name MATCHES (${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_created_after_invoice_receipt})))

metrics.name: No-touch-order rate
metrics.description: Percentage of no-touch-orders, which are cases that ran without any changes or typical rework events. Automation of events is not considered.
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES ((${ptp_ecc_s4h_change_event_flow}))) AND (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Invoices waiting for Goods Receipt
metrics.description: Total number of cases with Invoices waiting for the Goods Receipt event
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	AND (event_name MATCHES ((${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_event_flow})))
	)

metrics.name: Volume of cancelled orders
metrics.description: Volume of orders in USD that have been cancelled

metrics.name: Cancellation of Goods Receipts
metrics.description: Total number of cases in which a Goods Receipt has been reversed
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_reversal_events}))
	AND (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	)

metrics.name: Perfect order fulfillment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases that went through without any reversal of Goods Receipts
metrics.signalFragment:
(COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	-
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_reversal_events}))
	))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events}))
	)
	* 100

metrics.name: PO Item changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with PO Item changes
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES((${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_change_event_flow}))))
	/
	COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_po_creation_events}))
	)
	* 100

metrics.name: Late payments cycle time
metrics.description: Average payment cycle time of cases with late payments
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER 
		(WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_events})))
	-
	(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER 
    	(WHERE event_name IN (${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_events})))
	) FILTER (
	WHERE (${ptp_ecc_s4h_late_payment_condition})
	AND ${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_date} IS NOT NULL
	)

metrics.name: Invoice reversal rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases with reversed invoices
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES(${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_reversal_events})
	)
/ COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES ((${ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_event_flow}))
	)
* 100

metrics.name: Number of manual PR item creations
metrics.description: Number of purchase requisition items that were created manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name = 'Create PR Item'))))
	)

metrics.name: PR item creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase requisition items that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Create PR Item'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = 'Create PR Item'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual PO item creations
metrics.description: Number of purchase order items that were created manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name = 'Create PO Item'))))
	)

metrics.name: PO item creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase order items that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Create PO Item'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "case_id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = 'Create PO Item'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual contract creations
metrics.description: Number of contracts that were created manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Contract Id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name = 'Create Contract'))))
	)

metrics.name: Contract creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of contracts that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Contract Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Create Contract'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Contract Id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = 'Create Contract'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual GR creations
metrics.description: Number of goods receipts that were created manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "GR Document ID") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name = 'Create Goods Receipt'))))
	)

metrics.name: GR creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of goods receipts that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "GR Document ID") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Create Goods Receipt'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "GR Document ID") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = 'Create Goods Receipt'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual invoice creations
metrics.description: Number of invoices that were created manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name = 'Create FI Invoice'))))
	)

metrics.name: Invoice creation automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were created using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Create FI Invoice'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = 'Create FI Invoice'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual invoice clearings
metrics.description: Number of invoices that were cleared manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name = 'Clear Invoice'))))
	)

metrics.name: Invoice clearing automation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared using automation
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" IN ('System','Service')
		AND (event_name = 'Clear Invoice'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name = 'Clear Invoice'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual contract changes
metrics.description: Number of contracts that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name LIKE 'Change Contract%'))))
	)

metrics.name: Manual contract changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of contracts that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change Contract%'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name LIKE 'Change Contract%'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual PO changes
metrics.description: Number of purchase orders that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name LIKE 'Change PO%'))))
	)

metrics.name: Manual PO changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase orders that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change PO%'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name LIKE 'Change PO%'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual PR changes
metrics.description: Number of purchase requisitions that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name LIKE 'Change PR%'))))
	)

metrics.name: Manual PR changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of purchase requisitions that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change PR%'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name LIKE 'Change PR%'
	)))) * 100

metrics.name: Number of manual invoice changes
metrics.description: Number of invoices that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
	AND (event_name LIKE 'Change Inv%'))))
	)

metrics.name: Manual invoice changes rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were changed manually
metrics.signalFragment:
SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE ("Event Created By User Type" = 'Dialog'
		AND (event_name LIKE 'Change Inv%'))))
	) /
	SUM((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Unique Event Id") FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name LIKE 'Change Inv%'
	)))) * 100

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_po_creation_events
variables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase order, for example 'Create PO Item'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_po_acknowledgement_events
variables.description: Events indicating the acknowledgement of a purchase order item, for example 'Receive Order Confirmation'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_po_change_event_flow
variables.description: Events indicating changes to purchase order item, for example 'Change PO Item Net Price'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Change PO Item Material'|'Change PO Item Quantity'|'Change PO Item Net Price'|'Change PO Item Plant'|'Change PO Confirmed Delivery Date'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_pr_creation_events
variables.description: Events indicating the creation of a purchase requisition item, for example 'Create PR Item'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_events
variables.description: Events indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example 'Record Invoice Receipt', 'Create FI Invoice'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_receipt_event_flow
variables.description: Event flow indicating the receipt of an invoice, for example ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt')

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_po_created_after_invoice_receipt
variables.description: Event flow indicating the creation of a PO Item after the Invoice has been received, for example ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Create PO Item'

defaultValues.defaultValue: ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Create PO Item'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_events
variables.description: Events indicating the clearing of an invoice, for example 'Clear Invoice'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_clearing_date
variables.description: Attribute referring to the clearing date of an invoice, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_return_delivery_events
variables.description: Events identifying cases of delivery returns, for example 'Return Delivery via Delivery Note'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_events
variables.description: Events identifying the receipt of goods, for example 'Create Goods Receipt'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_reversal_events
variables.description: Events identifying the reversal of a Goods Receipt, for example 'Reverse Goods Receipt'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_late_payment_condition
variables.description: Condition that identifies cases with invoices paid late, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

defaultValues.defaultValue: "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_overdue_payment_condition
variables.description: Condition that identifies cases with overdue invoices, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

defaultValues.defaultValue: "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_total_invoice_amount
variables.description: Attribute referring to the total amount of invoice items before any deductions, for example "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount in USD"

defaultValues.defaultValue: "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount in USD"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_discount_percentage
variables.description: Attribute referring to the maximum percentage discount that can be applied to the total amount of an invoice item, for example "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Percentage 1"

defaultValues.defaultValue: "Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount Percentage 1" /100

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_discount_applied_to_invoice
variables.description: Attribute referring to the actual cash discount applied when the invoice was paid, for example "Last FI Invoice Cash Discount in USD"

defaultValues.defaultValue: "Last FI Invoice Cash Discount in USD"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_compliant_event_sequence
variables.description: Sequence of events that fulfil the compliance requirements of a Procure-to-Pay process, for example ^ 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Create PO Item' ~> 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> ('Create FI Invoice'|'Record Invoice Receipt') ~> 'Clear Invoice' $

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_two_way_match_condition
variables.description: Condition identifying cases with a two-way attribute match, for example "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."

defaultValues.defaultValue: "PO Item Net Order Value" = "PO Item Total Invoiced Net Amount Document Curr."

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_po_item_cancellation_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a purchase order item was cancelled, for example 'Delete PO Item'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_po_item_net_order_value
variables.description: Attribute referring to the net order value of the PO Item, for example "PO Item Net Order Value in USD"

defaultValues.defaultValue: "PO Item Net Order Value in USD"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_delivery_due_date
variables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the delivery is due, for example "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_goods_receipt_date
variables.description: Attribute referring to the date when the goods have been received, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date")

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_late_delivery_condition
variables.description: Condition identifying cases that are delivered too late, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

defaultValues.defaultValue: DATE_TRUNC('day', "Last GR Creation Date") > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_overdue_delivery_condition
variables.description:
Condition identifying cases with an overdue delivery, for example DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
	  AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL

defaultValues.defaultValue:
DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > "PO Item Last Requested Delivery Date"
	  AND "PO Item Delivery Completed" IS NULL

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_delivery_completed_condition
variables.description: Condition indicating that the delivery for a PO Item is completed, for example "PO Item Delivery Completed" = 'Yes'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_payment_block_events
variables.description: Events indicating that a payment block was set or removed, for example 'Remove Payment Block', 'Set Payment Block'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_maverick_buying_po_after_invoice_condition
variables.description: Event flow indicating that the Purchase Order was created after the receival of the Invoice, for example 'Create FI Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_maverick_buying_price_change_condition
variables.description: Event flow indicating that price changes happened after the Goods Receipt event, for example 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Change PO Item Net Price'

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Create Goods Receipt' ~> 'Change PO Item Net Price'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_change_event_flow
variables.description: Event flow indicating that change events happened in a case, for example ('Change PR Net Price'|'Send Purchase Order Update'|'Change PO Item Net Price'|'Change Invoice Payment Terms')

defaultValues.defaultValue: 'Change PR Delivery Date'|'Reactivate PR Item'|'Change PR Material'|'Change PR Quantity'|'Change PR Net Price'|'Change PO Vendor'|'Change PO Currency'|'Change PO Payment Terms'|'Send PO Overdue Note'|'Dun Order Confirmation'|'Send Purchase Order Update'|'Reactivate PO Item'|'Change PO Item Material'|'Change PO Item Quantity'|'Change PO Item Net Price'|'Change PO Item Plant'|'Change PO Confirmed Delivery Date'|'Reverse Goods Receipt'|'Reverse Invoice'|'Set Payment Block'|'Remove Payment Block'|'Change Payment Block'|'Change Invoice Payment Method'|'Change Invoice Payment Terms'

variables.name: ptp_ecc_s4h_invoice_reversal_events
variables.description: Events identifying the reversal of an Invoice, for example 'Reverse Invoice'
